str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Adam, the first man, the first parent of the human race. Of Hebrew origin; Adam, the first man; typically man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
Adam, the first man, the first parent of the human race. Of Hebrew origin; Adam, the first man; typically man.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To make that which was dead to live, cause to live, quicken. From the same as zoon and poieo; tovitalize.
